componentDescription: A dropdown list component allowing users to select an option or search for items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ComboBox, used to differentiate it from others in a form.

name.description: Optional name property, usually used when the ComboBox is part of a form.

items.description: List of items that the ComboBox will display as options to choose from.

onSelect.description: Optional callback function that is called when an item is selected.

searchEnabled.description: Boolean flag to enable or disable the search functionality within the ComboBox.

left.description: Optional ReactNode to be displayed on the left side of the ComboBox.

right.description: Optional ReactNode to be displayed on the right side of the ComboBox.

label.description: Optional label to describe the purpose of the ComboBox to the user.

showTick.description: Boolean flag to show or hide a tick mark next to selected items.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text to be shown when nothing is selected in the ComboBox.

styles.description: Optional object to override default ComboBox styles.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the search input when the search is enabled.

[x: string].description: Allows the ComboBox to accept additional properties not explicitly defined in the interface.
